name: @yggdrasil-au/wlampctl-cli
description: Dev environment for all my personal and private web development projects based on my astro template
author: samarixum

scripts.build: cd source\xampp-ui\new && cargo build --release && copy /Y target\release\wlampctl.exe ..\..\xampp-build\Built\installed-xampp\wlampctl.exe
